description:
Eimura Akane is the leader of a trio of gyaru classmates whom http://anidb.net/ch89068 [Yoshiko] starts interacting with later in the series. They do not really like her, but they are just as dumb as Yoshiko in school.
Akane is the most antagonistic of the three against Yoshiko. However, she tends to listen and participate in Yoshiko`s schemes, and is sometimes unwillingly manipulated by her. She dislikes http://anidb.net/ch89069 [Akuru], who calls her ugly. She also wants to be more popular and have a boyfriend.
Source: Wikipedia, edited.
name: Eimura Akane
